title: Strengthening Nursing Practical Competencies: Situated Spiral Curriculum Combining Digital Literacy and Mathematical Thinking

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: To solve complex mathematical problems at four or more levels, learners can design problem-solving processes using digital collaboration tools (e.g., AR simulations, online whiteboards).
When explaining mathematical concepts, learners can create digital artifacts that combine multiple representations (text, images, interactive elements).
Based on peer feedback from an online platform, learners can improve their digital outputs at least three times.
Learners can select mathematical learning materials by applying digital resource evaluation criteria (reliability, suitability, ethics).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
